channel.title: bash on Varun Saini
channel.description: Recent content in bash on Varun Saini

item.title: send key value messages to kafka from console producer
item.description: Kafka provides kafka-console-producer.sh to send messages from stdin > bin/kafka-console-producer.sh --broker-list localhost:9092 --topic test message1 message2 or file. > bin/kafka-console-producer.sh --broker-list localhost:9092 --topic test < messages.txt messages send from above methods are parsed as values. If you want to send 10 messages from console producer with explicitly defined key. for (( i=1; i<=10; i++ )); do echo "key$$i:value$$i" | bin/kafka-console-producer.sh --broker-list localhost:9092 --topic test --property "parse.key=true" --property "key.separator=:"; done;
